Fales Library and Special Collections
Burning Water Archive
Burning Water
MSS.007
0.25 Linear Feet in one half manuscript box.
circa 1962-1968 The Burning Water Archive is a collection of correspondence to the editors, Edward Kissam and Paul Boorstin, and issues 1-5 of the journal.
Provenance
The Burning Water Archive was acquired in 1969.
Access Restrictions
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); The Burning Water Archive; MSS 7; [box number]; [folder number], Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
Scope and Content Note
The Burning Water Archive is a collection of correspondence to the editors, Edward Kissam and Paul Boorstin, from 1962 to 1968. Collection highlights include letters written by Carol Bergé, Robert Bly, Ted Enslin, Clayton Eschleman, and Gary Snyder.
Arrangement
The correspondence in the collection is arranged alphabetically. The issues of the journal are organized chronologically.
Missing Title
Series I: Correspondence and Issues of Burning Water
Separated Material
There is no information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials that have been physically separated or removed.
Use Restrictions
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

Series I: Correspondence and Issues of Burning Water
Scope and Contents note
Series 1 contains one box of correspondence to the editors, Edward Kissam and Paul Boorstin between 1962-1968. Noted correspondents include Carol Bergé, Robert Bly, Ted Enslin, Clayton Eschleman, and Gary Snyder. Series 1 also contains issues 1-5 of Burning Water.Carol Bergé, Robert Bly, George Bowering1962-1964; 196611Cardona-Hine, Alvan Choudhury, Malay Roy - Defense Fund, John Willian Corrington1962-1964; 196612Maurice English, D.J.
